DESCRIPTION: Dandu health facility  is located in  Mandera county in Kenya. It is a level 3 health facility that provides curative, immunization, antenatal, maternity, postnatal services, HIV, TB services, laboratory and ultrasound services. It also includes community health services and solar lighting, The objective of this project was to develop and test the CLC concept.The project partners involved in this project include:-  Philips, UNFPA and Mandera County.The project started  in: July, 2017, as an Exploration project.
